title: Eddie Levert, Storm Update, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Eddie Levert, Storm Update, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
We open up the show living in expectation.  Eddie Levert has a bone to pick with the black community.  The NFL season kicks off tonight.  We give an update with Hurricane Dorian.  Chris Paul made the 2019 edition of ESPN the Magazine's Body Issue.  Sheryl Underwood stops by to discuss Gregory Craig and Sports Illustrated.  Miss Carla covers Real Housewives of Potomac and more in Reality Update.  Ricky Rozay opens up in his memoir about his codeine usage.  Steve talks about the possibility of doing the 2020 Non-athletic Body Issue for ESPN.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog extends well wishes to his good friend and family Kevin Hart and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
